cross: Masdevallia Samantha Kha Ã— Masdevallia Patricia Hill

measurements.description: Three flowers on three inflorescences, held strikingly above foliage; dorsal sepal yellow blushed red, caudae darker red; lateral sepals yellow, mainly overlaid saturated red, darker venation, caudae crossed distally, dark red; petals minute, white; lip minute, white tipped red; column yellow, anther cap cream; substance hard; texture cilliate.
